Worn by Ossur Americas-sponsored, history-making, bilateral amputee Oscar Pistorius from South Africa, Eythor and his team helped him win the right to compete in the Olympics. Today the Cheetah Flex-Foot is the prosthesis used by nearly every medalist at the Paralympics.

Prior to that, Eythor spent 13 years in executive management with Ossur, a global leader in the development, manufacture and distribution of non-invasive orthopedic products, serving the last six years as president of Ossur Americas.
